name: Hand Sealer
description:
This is the ultimate product for dry hands! It's called "sealer" because it seals in Argan oil and calandula as it protects your skin from elements that cause dry skin. It leaves your hands feeling silky smooth not greasy.  Lightly scented...perfect for men and women. Two drops is all you'll need to become a believer!         

Use alone or at night apply over our Skin Balm for amazing results!


1 fl. oz.

name: Lotion with Argan Oil
description:
While most lotions are comprised of more than 90% water, Product lotion contains much less water. This means Product lotion contains more of the ingredients that your skin needs. Product lotion absorbs into your skin quickly and hydrates deeper so you won’t have to constantly reapply. Product does not contain cheap mineral oil or petrolatum which are made from petroleum and can leave a greasy residue feeling. Product’s ingredients are gentler for everyday use even on the most sensitive skin.

The light tropical fruit scent will stimulate your senses. Your skin will look healthier, smell sweeter, and become softer to touch. You need to experience it for yourself.

Recommended use: rub a small amount to skin and enjoy.

name: Hair Serum with Argan Oil
description:
Hair can become damaged by the everyday effects of our environment. Product beautifies and protects hair with long lasting silkiness and shine that people will notice. While shampoo cleanses hair of dirt and oil, it can also wash out the good qualities that keep hair shiny and soft. Product serum protects hair from that “washed out” feeling. Product is not diluted with alcohol like many serums…. this gives Product a thicker texture allowing you to use less and still keep your hair looking its best.

Cheaper serums contain ingredients that are not recommended or approved for both hair and skin. Product serum is made up of an extensive recipe of ingredients which are approved for both your skin as well as your hair.

Recommended use: 1-2 squirts on hands. Start with less than you would think is needed. Apply to middle and ends of damp hair. Blow dry and style hair as usual. Product is long lasting - general use every 2-3 days.

name: Skin Balm with Argan oil
description:
Soft skin needs to be protected and moisturized as well as dry skin. Product balm is perfect for everyday use. Product skin balm is at its best at night but can be used any time to help soften and revitalize skin. Perfect for application on hands and feet, balm is also great for use on lips. With just a small amount, your skin will feel velvety instead of oily like many other moisturizers tend to be. Product skin balm is concentrated…one tin lasts for months which makes for an incredible value. Natural light orange scented.

Recommended use: rub a small amount to hands, feet, and elbows preferably at night or after bathing. Top with our Hand Sealer for extra long lasting protection!

Ingredients: Calandula infused extra virgin Olive oil, Shea butter, Bees wax, Morocaan Argan oil, vitamin E, Orange essential oil.

name: Lip Repair Balm
description:
Ultra smooth and sweet tasting from natural Stevia. Made with Moroccan argan oil, shea butter, olive oil, bees wax, calendula flowers, allantoin from the comfrey plant, and a splash of orange oil...that's it! Compare our ingreidents to any other lip balm.

No petroleum products like mineral oil or petrolatum jelly or wax. 

No alcohols

No isopropopyl myristate

No propylene glycol
